generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Definition Client Biome
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Contains a description and components to define a Client Biome.

fields.title: Components
fields.description: Components for this Client Biome.

subForm.title: Client Biome Components
subForm.description: Any components that this Client Biome uses

fields.title: Minecraft Ambient Sounds
fields.description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

subForm.title: Ambient Sounds
subForm.description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

fields.title: Addition
fields.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position

fields.title: Loop
fields.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome

fields.title: Mood
fields.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low. Biomes without an ambient mood sound will use the 'ambient.cave' sound.

fields.title: Minecraft Atmosphere Identifier
fields.description: Set the identifier used for atmospherics in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Atmospheric Scattering JSON schemas under the "atmospherics" directory. Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

subForm.title: Atmosphere Identifier
subForm.description: Set the identifier used for atmospherics in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Atmospheric Scattering JSON schemas under the "atmospherics" directory. Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

fields.title: Atmosphere Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of atmosphere definition to use

fields.title: Minecraft Biome Music
fields.description: Affect how music plays within the biome

subForm.title: Biome Music
subForm.description: Affect how music plays within the biome

fields.title: Music Definition
fields.description: Music to be played when inside this biome. If left off or not found the default music will be determined by the dimension. Empty string will result in no music.

fields.title: Volume Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier temporarily and gradually applied to music volume when within this biome. Must be a value between 0 and 1, inclusive.

fields.title: Minecraft Color Grading Identifier
fields.description: Set the identifier used for color grading in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Color Grading JSON schemas under the "color_grading" directory. Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

subForm.title: Color Grading Identifier
subForm.description: Set the identifier used for color grading in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Color Grading JSON schemas under the "color_grading" directory. Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

fields.title: Color Grading Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of color_grading definition to use

fields.title: Minecraft Dry Foliage Color
fields.description: Set the dry foliage color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default dry foliage color behavior.

subForm.title: Dry Foliage Color
subForm.description: Set the dry foliage color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default dry foliage color behavior.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: RGB color of dry foliage

fields.title: Minecraft Fog Appearance
fields.description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

subForm.title: Fog Appearance
subForm.description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

fields.title: Fog Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of fog definition to use

fields.title: Minecraft Foliage Appearance
fields.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

subForm.title: Foliage Appearance
subForm.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: RGB color of foliage, or a Foliage Color Map object.

fields.title: Minecraft Grass Appearance
fields.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

subForm.title: Grass Appearance
subForm.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: RGB color of grass.

fields.title: Minecraft Lighting Identifier
fields.description: Set the identifier used for lighting in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Lighting JSON schemas under the "lighting" directory. Biomes without this component will have default lighting settings.

subForm.title: Lighting Identifier
subForm.description: Set the identifier used for lighting in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Lighting JSON schemas under the "lighting" directory. Biomes without this component will have default lighting settings.

fields.title: Lighting Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of lighting definition to use

fields.title: Minecraft Sky Color
fields.description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

subForm.title: Sky Color
subForm.description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

fields.title: Sky Color
fields.description: RGB color of the sky

fields.title: Minecraft Water Appearance
fields.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

subForm.title: Water Appearance
subForm.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

fields.title: Surface Color
fields.description: RGB color of the water surface

fields.title: Surface Opacity
fields.description: Opacity of the water surface (must be between 0 for invisible and 1 for opaque, inclusive)

fields.title: Minecraft Water Identifier
fields.description: Set the identifier used for rendering water in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Water JSON schemas under the "water" directory. Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

subForm.title: Water Identifier
subForm.description: Set the identifier used for rendering water in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Water JSON schemas under the "water" directory. Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

fields.title: Water Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of water definition to use

fields.title: Description
fields.description: Non-component settings, including the Client Biome name.

subForm.title: Client Biome Description
subForm.description: Contains non-component settings for a Client Biome.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of the Client Biome, used by other features like the '/locate biome' command. Must match the name of a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack.
